= RPC Services =

You just have to create a class in you _server_ package that inherits from *TagServiceImpl* : 

{{{
public class MyTagService extends TagServiceImpl {

}
}}}

Do not forget to add the following lines in your _war/WEB_INF/web.xml file_ : 

{{{
<servlet>
    <servlet-name>tagService</servlet-name>
    <servlet-class>gdurelle.tagcloud.server.TagServiceImpl</servlet-class>
</servlet>
  
<servlet-mapping>
    <servlet-name >tagService</servlet-name>
    <url-pattern >/tagcloud/tagService</url-pattern>
</servlet-mapping>
}}}

Replacing *tagcloud* in the _url-pattern_ by the name given in your project xml description file _( *.gwt.xml )_ : 
{{{
<module rename-to='myproject'>
   ...
</module>
}}}
